info.title: 1A_REST_JSON_Search_Offer

5.9.0: chaincode pattern {2,3} added min and max length
pattern for creditCards and message added
5.8.1: data.alternateProperties - Single (Error response 404) - Added example value
Updated multiple objects description to match Linting Rules
RULE016 - Parameters description should start with lower case and should not end with a dot
RULE015 - Models description should start with lower-case letter or number and should not end with a dot
RULE024 - The pattern is recommended for the strings that are not enum or parameter
5.8.0: query.parameter.views -Multi- Updated description to add new view "minOfferPerHotel"(aka Multi-LowestRate-availability)
5.5.1: ratePlans[].rateAccessCodes[] -Pricing. Correction on missing field from 5.4.0
5.4.0: rates.rateAccessCodes[] description updated. No more than 8 codes are expected. Any extra code is ignored - Multi, Single
productUses[].pricingFrequency added to provide this information for mandatory products of predefined packages - Multi, Single, Pricing
productUses[].pricingMethod added to provide this information for mandatory products of predefined packages - Multi, Single, Pricing
productUses[].bookingPattern added to provide this information for mandatory products of predefined packages - Multi, Single, Pricing
offers[].bookingCodes[].rateAccessCode marked as deprecated - Multi, Single
ratePlans[].rateAccessCodes[] - No more than 8 codes would be returned, to reflect input limitation - Multi
ratePlans[].cdNumbers[] description added - Multi, Single, Pricing
alternate property information will now come with error 404
5.3.3: data.hotels[].ratePlans[].rateAccessCodes[] content correction from array[string] to array[object], object now contains a code, name and description - Multi
5.3.2: offers[].policies|guarantee|acceptedGuarantees|.creditCards[] - correction of creditCards object to remove additionalProperties
5.3.1: rates.promoCode - replaced incorrect pattern of 20 with correct Maximum Length of 50 - Multi, Single requests
data.promoCode - replaced incorrect pattern of 20 with correct Maximum Length of 50 - Pricing request
URL path parameter ratePlanCode max length corrected from 8 to 50 - Pricing
data.denials[].ratePlanCode - corrected max length from 8 to 50 - Single, Pricing
ratePlans[].promoCode - replaced incorrect pattern of 20 with correct Maximum Length of 50 - Multi, Single, Pricing response
updated description of Multi Avail views.
5.2.0: new enum value, description for options.includePublicRates - Multi
new option minMaxOfferPerHotel for the "view" parameter - Multi
5.1.0: addition of gamingBucket attribute in the Single response
extension of rate plan code length, inventory type code, pricegridcode length
extension of group code length in Single request
5.0.0: Inclusive Tax & Service Charge Totals and Subtotals by Channel Preferred Rate
Taxes, Service Charges and Fees by Guest Type/ Age
Pricing by Occupancy and Guest Type
products[].guestCounts[] - Multi, Single, Pricing - new structure with otaCode, count, age
functional payload of POST requests must now be sent in a data node
rates.pricingFrequency - new enum value "PerUse" - Single, Pricing
hotel.GuestTypeDefinitions - return the age range for request guests - Multi, Single, Pricing
productUses[].guestCounts[] - new structure with guestType, otaCode, count, age - Multi, Single, Pricing
taxDefinitions[].value renamed values and changed from string to array[object] - Single, Pricing
rates.pricingMethod - new enum values "PerProductPerOcc" and "PerProductPerGuestType" - Single, Pricing
productCode renamed inventoryTypeCode - Multi, Single, Pricing
productTypeCode renamed productCode - Multi, Single, Pricing
URI?start_date renamed URI?startDate - Multi, Single, Pricing
taxAmount.OTAcode renamed taxAmount.otaCode (to be aligned with Reservation API) - Single, Pricing
taxDefinitions[].startDate & endDate renamed start & end - Single, Pricing
productCode renamed inventoryTypeCode - Multi, Single, Pricing
productTypeCode renamed productCode - Multi, Single, Pricing
productName renamed inventoryTypeName - Multi, Single, Pricing
productTypeName renamed productName - Multi, Single, Pricing
amount renamed amt - Multi, Single, Pricing
average renamed avg - Multi, Single, Pricing
productLinesDescriptions renamed productLinesDescs - Multi, Single, Pricing
attributesCodes renamed attCodes - Multi, Single, Pricing
maximumNumberParticipant renamed maxNbParticipant - Multi, Single, Pricing
ama-api-version from header - Multi, Single, Pricing
HTTP error description - Multi, Single, Pricing
channel preferred rate (daily average, checkin, highest) to precise the amount is for quantity 1 - Multi, Single, Pricing
Description updated for field availStatus under products and ratePlans - Multi, Single

Replacement of returnRateDetails (boolean from API body) by a view (query parameter) to distinguish 2 views: hotelPriceRange (aka Multi-availability). minMaxOfferPerRatePlan (aka Multi-Single-availability) - Multi

info.description: The Search Offer API of the Amadeus Hospitality CRS application allows to search offers, multi hotel, single hotel and retrieve an offer details.

tags.name: Search offer
tags.description: The Search Offers API of the Amadeus Hospitality CRS application allows to search offers and retrieve offer details for single or multiple hotels.

post.description: The operation multi-availability allows to search offers for multiple properties
The operation single-availability allows to search offers for a given property
The operation retrieve-pricing allows to retrieve details for a specific offers along with a list of add-ons proposals

ama-pos.name: Ama-Pos
ama-pos.description: schema must match with Ama-Pos definition

ama-channel-identifiers.name: Ama-Channel-Identifiers
ama-channel-identifiers.description: schema must match with Ama-Channel-Identifiers definition

start.name: startDate
start.description: check-in date of the availability.  The lowest accepted value is the present date. No dates in the past

duration.name: duration
duration.description: length of the stay. Number of days required followed by letter D. For instance, 2D for 2 days

view.name: view
view.description: level of detail requested. Available views: hotelPriceRange (price ranges at hotel level, also referred to as "Multi with price range"), minMaxOfferPerRatePlan (lowest and highest offers per RatePlan per hotel, also referred to as "Multi with min max offers by rate plan"),minMaxOfferPerHotel (lowest and highest offers per Hotel, also referred to as "Multi with min max offers") and minOfferPerHotel (lowest offer per Hotel, also referred to as "Multi with Lowest Offer")

propertyCodes.name: propertyCodes
propertyCodes.description: a list of hotel internal codes. The list of codes has the following syntax: property_codes = PROP1,PROP2,PROP3

bodyParameterMulti.description: the body section, containing the data and sub-resources

bodyParameterSingle.description: the body section, containing the data and sub-resources

bodyParameterPricing.description: the body section, containing the data and sub-resources

rateAccessCode.description: requested rate access code attached to the rate plan code

products.description: the list of products (base product + attribute(s)) returned

alternateProperties.description: this is now deprecated. List of alternate properties. Only returned if there is no availability in the requested property

excludeTaxIndicator.description: returned in case tax exclusion is forced in request (forceExcludeTax)

isSellStrategyIncludedIfNoAvail.description: indicates if sell strategy rates are returned because none of the rate plans of the candidate list are available and includeSellStrategy="ifNoAvail" in the request

keepPricingInformation.description: tells the calling system whether pricing information should be kept in the single availability response for that vendor

products.description: the list of products (base product + attribute(s)) returned

requestedOffer.description: the requested offer. Not returned when reservationContext is provided in the request

additionalOffers.description: the list of additional offers returned

chainCode.description: unique identifier of a Chain in the CRS

brandCode.description: unique identifier of a Brand in a Chain

cityCode.description: The code of the city of the property

value.description: value that can be an amount or a percentage

requestedRatesMulti.description: requested rates (Rate plan codes, group code, OTA categories, themes/elements)

ratePlanCodes.description: list of requested rate plan codes

types.description: list of OTA rateplan types requested. Concatenation of the code of the list and the code of the item (RPT8, RPT13...)

themesAndElements.description: list of codes of themes/elements requested

items.description: code of the theme or element

rateAccessCodes.description: list of requested rate access codes. Up to 8 codes can be requested. Any additionnal code is ignored

requestedRatesSingle.description: requested rates (Rate plan codes, group code, OTA categories, themes/elements). The first 17 rate categories and corporate discount numbers are taken into account in the availability computation process, any extra rate categories and CD Numbers are discarded. Rate categories cannot be requested if themes or and elements are present in the request

ratePlanCodes.description: list of requested rate plan codes

types.description: list of OTA rateplan types requested. Concatenation of the code of the list and the code of the item (RPT8, RPT13...)

themesAndElements.description: list of codes of themes/elements requested

items.description: code of the theme or element

rateAccessCodes.description: list of requested rate access codes. Up to 8 codes can be requested. Any additionnal code is ignored

optionsMulti.description: requested options for the request (budget, loyalty, sell strategy, description, indicators)

appendBonusRates.description: boolean to append the available bonus point rate plans in Multi availability response

includePublicRates.description:
drives the inclusion of the public rates and can take four values:
 * 'always' - the public rates should be returned in the response. This is the default value
 * 'never' - the public rates should not be returned in the response
 * 'ifNoAvail' - the public rates should be returned in the response only if none of the requested rate plans is available
 * 'followChannel' - the channel settings should be checked in order to determine if the public rates should be included in the response. Only applicable when Distribution Rules functionality is active

includeTaxAverageDetails.description: boolean to return average amount per tax in minMaxOfferPerHotel view

optionsSingle.description: requested options for the request (budget, loyalty, sell strategy, description, indicators)

forceExcludeTax.description: to force the display of Average Night Rate After Tax, Checkin Night Rate After Tax and RatesDefinition amount as CRS room rate minus all included taxes amounts. When this indicator is present in the request, 2 fields are returned in the response only if the applicable tax (and not the service charge) on the stay is per night or per guest/ per night. Moreover, any tax/service charge set as included in the system will be treated as excluded in order to return a daily base amount excluding all taxes/service charges. The flag in the request is always forwarded in the response (excludeTaxIndicator)

includePublicRates.description:
indicates if the public rates have to be added to the candidate list. Only applicable when Distribution Rules functionality is active
  'never' the public rates should not be included in the response
  'ifNoAvail' the public rates should be included in the response only if none of the requested rate plans is available
  'followChannel' the channel settings should be checked in order to determine if the public rates should be included in the response

perpetualOffer.description: boolean to request perpetual offers. If true, the loyaltyId must be provided. It is mutually exclusive with oneOffOffer flag

oneOffOffer.description: boolean to request one-off offers. If true, the loyaltyId and promoCode must be provided. It is mutually exclusive with perpetualOffer flag

cfNumber.description: Reservation confirmation number, it is an ACRS confirmation number.

optionsPricing.description: requested options for the request (loyalty, description, security indicators)

reservationContext.description: this element should be provided in order to get the list of optional products that can be added to an already booked offer. It's a string composed of ref_id and segment_id, separated by a '/'

returnAdditionalOffers.description: boolean to indicate if additional offers should be returned or not

min.description: the minimum budget in which the values returned by the availability response should fit. It specifies that the system should take into account only the products with a price greater or equal to the specified value. The minimum accepted value is 0

max.description: the maximum budget in which the values returned by the availability response should fit. It specifies that the system should take into account only the products with a price lower or equal to the specified value

budgetType.description: indicates if the requested budget corresponds to daily prices or total prices

includeSellStrategyMulti.description:
indicates if the sell strategy has to be added to the candidate list
  'never' the rate plan sell strategy should not be included in the response
  'followChannel' the channel settings should be checked in order to determine if the rate plan sell strategy should be included in the response

includeSellStrategySingle.description:
indicates if the sell strategy has to be added to the candidate list. Not applicable when Distribution Rules functionality is active.
 'never' the rate plan sell strategy should not be included in the response
 'ifNoAvail' the rate plan sell strategy should be included in the response only if none of the requested rate plans is available
 'followChannel' the channel settings should be checked in order to determine if the rate plan sell strategy should be included in the response

disabilityRequest.description:
indicates how products have to be returned depending on their accessibility configuration
 * 'accessible' - only accessible products are returned
 * 'nonAccessible' - only non-accessible products are returned
 * 'accessibleAndNonAccessible' - both accessible and non-accessible products are returned
 * 'accessibleIfNoAvail' - the accessible products are only returned if there is no more availability for the non-accessible products

requestedDescriptionSingle.description: indicates if the description of rate plans and room types have to be returned

ratePlanLongDescFlag.description: to return rate plan short and long descriptions

requestedDescriptionPricing.description: indicates if the description of rate plans and room types have to be returned

ratePlanLongDescFlag.description: to return rate plan short and long descriptions

packageDescFlag.description: to return expanded rate plan description (linked to package)

requestedDescriptionMulti.description: indicates if the description of rate plans and room types have to be returned

ratePlanLongDescFlag.description: to return rate plan short and long descriptions

programName.description: loyalty program name. For example, Ambassador - 'AMB'
loyalty program name. For example, Ambassador - 'AMB'

distanceUnit.description: the unit of measurement in which distance is expressed. Concatenation of the code of the OTA list for distance unit and the code of the item "UOM1" (miles), "UOM2" (kilometers)

requestedProductMulti.description: it can contain the elements which are the same as common-all

attributes.description: list of attribute codes composing the requested product

guestCounts.description: guestCount details. A single array item is expected for NR Product (any additional array item is ignored)

startDate.description: requested start date. Only applicable for optional NRP

duration.description: duration of the period. Number of days required followed by letter D. For instance, 2D for 2 days. Only applicable for optional NRP

requestedProductSingle.description: it can contain the elements which are the same as common-all

attributes.description: list of attribute codes composing the requested product

guestCounts.description: guestCount details. A single array item is expected for NR Product (any additional array item is ignored)

startDate.description: requested start date. Only applicable for optional NRP

duration.description: duration of the period. Number of days required followed by letter D. For instance, 2D for 2 days. Only applicable for optional NRP

requestedProductPricing.description: it can contain the elements which are the same as common-all

guestCounts.description: guestCount details. A single array item is expected for NR Product (any additional array item is ignored)

startDate.description: requested start date. Only applicable for optional NRP

duration.description: duration of the period. Number of days required followed by letter D. For instance, 2D for 2 days. Only applicable for optional NRP

otaCode.description: online travel agency (OTA) Age Qualifier Code, either age or otaCode or both must be provided

count.description: number of guest. Applicable for SR product. Not applicable for NR product (ignored if sent)

age.description: age of the guest(s), either age or otaCode or both must be provided

otaCode.description: online travel agency (OTA) Age Qualifier Code

customDisplay.description: parameter to filter the rate plans based on the value of their marketing display indicator.[A-Z]

attCodes.description: list of attribute codes composing the requested product

inventoryTypeName.description: name of the inventory type (short description)

desc.description: long description of the product if available

maxNbParticipant.description: maximum allowed number of participants for this product (extra participants included)

isFlowThrough.description: true if the room type is set to flow-through in the configuration of the property

isDisplayable.description: true if the product is displayable

isPremium.description: true if the product is a premium product

match.description: indicates if the inventory type is matching the requested attributes either ALL (meaning exact or at least) or SOME

attCodes.description: list of attribute codes composing the requested product

inventoryTypeName.description: name of the inventory type (short description)

desc.description: long description of the product if available

maxNbParticipant.description: maximum allowed number of participants for this product (extra participants included)

isFlowThrough.description: true if the room type is set to flow-through in the configuration of the property

isDisplayable.description: true if the product is displayable

isPremium.description: true if the product is a premium product

match.description: indicates if the inventory type is matching the requested attributes either ALL (meaning exact or at least) or SOME

maxAdultOccupancy.description: maximum adult occupancy allowed for this product

maxChildOccupancy.description: maximum child occupancy allowed for this product

attCodes.description: list of attribute codes composing the requested product

inventoryTypeName.description: name of the inventory type (short description)

desc.description: long description of the product if available

maxNbParticipant.description: maximum allowed number of participants for this product (extra participants included)

isFlowThrough.description: true if the room type is set to flow-through in the configuration of the property

isDisplayable.description: true if the product is displayable

isPremium.description: true if the product is a premium product

maxAdultOccupancy.description: maximum adult occupancy allowed for this product

maxChildOccupancy.description: maximum child occupancy allowed for this product

productCode.description: code defining the product (Sleeping room, meeting room or any service)

productName.description: name of the product part of the inventory type

pacCode.description: unique combination code of product, attributes and occupancy

otaCode.description: community code of the product type [OTA]

inventoryTypeCode.description: business code representing an inventory type, a combination of one product and optionally some attributes

errors.message: no product available for requested parameters

keepPricingInformation.description: tells the calling system whether pricing information should be kept in the single availability response for that vendor

error.message: No product available for requested parameters
No product available for requested parameters

duration.description: length of the stay. Number of days required followed by letter D. For instance, 2D for 2 days

responseCurrency.description: the currency of the response amounts expressed in (ISO 4217 format)

alternateProperties.description: list of alternate properties. Only returned if there is no availability in the requested property

propertyCurrency.description: hotel currency using the ISO 4217 currency codes

hotelCommon.description: the common part of object hotel in response

propertyCurrency.description: hotel currency using the ISO 4217 currency codes

responseCurrency.description: the currency of the response amounts expressed in (ISO 4217 format)

factLines.description: list of free text containing some info about the hotel

taxDefinitions.description: the applicable rules of taxes for each tax change of the stay

products.description: the list of products (base product + attribute(s)) returned

channelPreferredRate.description: indicates the preferred rate to be returned to the requestor channel

isCommissionable.description: if any rate plans are available, flag showing if they are commissionable or not. "Yes"= All rate plans are commissionable "No"= No rate plan is commissionable "Both"= At least one rate plan is commissionable, and at least one is not commissionable

availStatus.description: indicates the availability status of the hotel. available when there's at least one offer available in the hotel. Not available when there's no offer available in the hotel

arePackageRatesReturned.description: indicates if some package rate plans are included in the rate range returned

arePublicRatesIncludedIfNoAvail.description: true if requested rates are not available, includePublicRates=ifNoAvail in request and availability is returned

bonusRatePlans.description: contains the list of available bonus rate plans, if appendBonusRates flag in the request is set to True. If no available bonus rate plans or the appendBonusRates is not present, this element will not be returned. The rate plan codes returned in this structure are not added to the rate plan candidate list and therefore might not be included in the rate range returned

maxGuests.description: when no availability is returned and some availability is possible with less guests, return the max number of adults needed to have availability. This field is returned only when there is no availability because of the requested occupancy

themesAndElements.description: list of themes and elements codes associated to the rate plans included in the rate range returned. This section will be present only if arePackageRatesReturned is set to true

match.description: indicates if hotel has inventory types matching requested attributes either ALL (meaning exact or at least) or SOME

propertyCurrency.description: hotel currency using the ISO 4217 currency codes

responseCurrency.description: the currency of the response amounts expressed in (ISO 4217 format)

factLines.description: list of free text containing some info about the hotel

taxDefinitions.description: all types of taxes/fees defined in the GRS at hotel level. Applicable only for view minMaxOfferPerHotel

guestTypeDefinitions.description: all applicable Property Guest Type set-up

freeGuestsDefinitions.description: all applicable free Guests rules set-up

hotelSingle.description: the common single pricing part of object hotel in response

factLines.description: list of free text containing some info about the hotel

taxDefinitions.description: all types of taxes/fees defined in the GRS at hotel level

guestTypeDefinitions.description: all applicable Property Guest Type set-up

freeGuestsDefinitions.description: all applicable free Guests rules set-up

hotelPricing.description: the common single pricing part of object hotel in response

factLines.description: list of free text containing some info about the hotel

taxDefinitions.description: all types of taxes/fees defined in the GRS at hotel level

guestTypeDefinitions.description: all applicable Property Guest Type set-up

freeGuestsDefinitions.description: all applicable free Guests rules set-up

packageDetailsSingle.description: gives the details of the package and lists the themes and elements codes associated to the rate plan in '''themesAndElements''' field. This structure is present only if the rate plan is a package

packageDetailsPricing.description: gives the details of the package

additionalDetails.description: the additional details of the rate plan's package

ratePlanMulti.description: list of requested rate plan codes or rate plan types. Also contains all the rate plans returned in case of Multi request with view minMaxOfferPerRatePlan, minMaxOfferPerHotel or minOfferPerHotel

types.description: list of rate plan types (OTA codes as per RPT OTA list) associated to the requested rate plan code or requested rate plan type

isFreeNight.description: indicates if the rate plan is a free night rate plan

cdNumbers.description: the list of requested Corporate Discount numbers associated to the negotiated rate plan. If the rate plan is associated to other non-requested CD numbers, those are not returned with the rate plan

isAwardAccepted.description: indicates if payment for this rate can be done totally or partially using reward points

desc.description: short description of the rate plan

longDesc.description: long description of the rate plan

rateAccessCodes.description: list of the requested rate access codes attached to the rate plan

areAmtsConfidential.description: indicates if amounts defined in the rate plan are confidential

isAvailabilityGuaranteed.description: indicates if availability is returned regardless of any restriction. Indicates also if the request follows the Royal Ambassador rules.

gamingBucket.description: indicates whether the rate plan is used for Comp or Cash flows. = ['Comp', 'Cash']

bookingMessage.description: booking message linked to the rate plan

availStatus.description: indicates if the product returned is available or not. "available" status is not returned if the products are available. "notAvailable" status is returned only for unavailable requested products

ratePlanAvailStatus.description: indicates if the rate plan is present in at least one available offer or not

productAvailStatus.description: indicates if the product is present in at least one available offer or not

rateRange.description: rate range in term of stays highest night rate, stays checkin rate and stays average daily rate. Returned only for view "hotelPriceRange"

highestRate.description: range computed on the whole stay based on the highest rate of each offer, per unit (quantity 1)

checkinRate.description: range computed on the check-in date of each offer, per unit (quantity 1)

avgRate.description: range computed on the whole stay based on the average rate of each product, per unit (quantity 1)

dailyTotalOccRate.description: rate range (lower bound, upper bound) for one day with extra guests

dailyBaseOccRate.description: rate range (lower bound, upper bound) for one day without extra guest

rateType.description: rate type of minimum, maximum rates. OTA codes as per RPT OTA list (Rate Plan Type)

rateDetails.description: rate details. Returned only for views "minMaxOfferPerRatePlan" , "minMaxOfferPerHotel" or "minOfferPerHotel"

period.description: period where the product is available

productLinesDescs.description: description lines computed by the process based on channel flags and on the short/long descriptions of the room types and the rate plans

isMainProduct.description: indicates if the product rate is the main one. By default, it's false

isOptional.description: indicates if the product rate is not included in the offer. By default, it's false

numberOfAvailableProducts.description: the number of available products during the stay

pricingFrequency.description: the frequency under which the product is priced. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

pricingMethod.description: the method under which the product is priced. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

bookingPattern.description: the booking pattern defines when and how many times the product is used. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

productRate.description: rate details of the product, optional for isMainProduct=False in case of package, will be displayed for isMainProduct=True and in case of requested optional service

ratesDef.description: the applicable rate changes of the stay. Amounts can include extra person charges depending on requested number of guests or channel setting

hasRateChange.description: if there are more than one rates in ratesDefinition, this flag will be set to true. It reflects rate change but not tax change

pricingFrequency.description: the frequency under which the product is priced

pricingMethod.description: the method under which the product is priced

bookingPattern.description: the booking pattern defines when and how many times the product is used

isDefaultPricingBased.description: indicates if current product is priced using default rate. By default, it's true

policies.description: element containing all the policies regarding guarantee, deposit, cancellation, no-show and early check-out

isPrepaid.description: true when deposit is 100% of the stay

isRefundable.description: true when the Refund feature is activated at property level and a refund percentage is set on the rate plan

checkinTime.description: the check-in time. The one applicable for the rate category or the house policy. The rate category level wins over house policy

checkoutTime.description: the check-out time. The one applicable for the rate category or the house policy. The rate category level wins over house policy

commission.description: element containing the commission value type, value and currency when value type is flat

bookingCode.description: unique identifier for the offer, identifying the sleeping room, the rate plan, and the rate access code associated to it. Only returned when the offer is for a sleeping room (with/without other services)

rateAccessCode.description: this is now deprecated. Requested rate access codes attached to the rate plan code

offerMulti.description: gives the details of a returned offer (rate plan + list of products) over the requested period

productUses.description: list of products (w/o attributes) with associated dates that are part of the offer

availStatus.description: offer's availability status. in case an requested offer is not available, NotAvailable will be returned

avg.description: average daily rate for the stay per unit for quantity 1

highest.description: highest daily rate for the stay per unit for quantity 1

checkin.description: checkin daily rate for the stay per unit for quantity 1

bookingCodes.description: list of the Booking Codes associated to the offer, along with their rate access code

freeGuestsDefIds.description: references the free Guests Definition items applied to compute this offer

rateAccessCode.description: requested rate access code attached to the rate plan

period.description: period where the product is available

productLinesDescs.description: description lines computed by the process based on channel flags and on the short/long descriptions of the room types and the rate plans

isMainProduct.description: indicates if the product rate is the main one. By default, it's false

isOptional.description: indicates if the product rate is not included in the offer. By default, it's false

numberOfAvailableProducts.description: the number of available products during the stay.

pricingFrequency.description: the frequency under which the product is priced. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

pricingMethod.description: the method under which the product is priced. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

bookingPattern.description: the booking pattern defines when and how many times the product is used. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

productRateMulti.description: rate details of the product, optional for isMainProduct=False in case of package, will be displayed for isMainProduct=True and in case of requested optional service

ratesDef.description: the applicable rate changes of the stay. Amounts can include extra person charges depending on requested number of guests or channel setting

pricingFrequency.description: the frequency under which the product is priced

pricingMethod.description: the method under which the product is priced

bookingPattern.description: the booking pattern defines when and how many times the product is used

isDefaultPricingBased.description: indicates if current product is priced using default rate. By default, it's true

availStatus.description: availability status of the group contract. By default, "Available" if not returned in the response

bookingProcedures.description: group Contract Booking Procedures, free text explaining how the group can be booked

isCommissionable.description: indicates if this Group Contract is commissionable or not

areAmtsConfidential.description: indicates if amounts defined in the Group Contract are confidential ones

cdNumbers.description: the list of requested Corporate Discount numbers associated to the group contract. If the group contract is associated to other non-requested Corporate Discount numbers, those are not returned

offerSingle.description: gives the details of a returned offer(rate plan + list of products) over the requested period

productUses.description: list of products (w/o attributes) with associated dates that are part of the offer

totalRate.description: total amount of an offer with extra person

totalBaseOccRate.description: total amount of an offer without extra person

totalExtraOccRate.description: total amount of extra person in an offer

availStatus.description: offer s availability status. In case an requested offer is not available, NotAvailable will be returned. The status OnRequest is only available on the chains/brand supporting the functionality

bookingCodes.description: list of the Booking Codes associated to the offer, along with their rate access code

freeGuestsDefIds.description: references the free Guests Definition items applied to compute this offer

rateAccessCode.description: requested rate access code attached to the rate plan

totalRate.description: total amount of an offer with extra person

totalBaseOccRate.description: total amount of an offer without extra person

totalExtraOccRate.description: total amount of extra person in an offer

dailyRates.description: a collection of rate changes by period. It can be a rate change or a tax change

bookingProcedures.description: group Contract Booking Procedures, free text explaining how the group can be booked

isCommissionable.description: indicates if this Group Contract is commissionable or not

areAmtsConfidential.description: indicates if amounts defined in the Group Contract are confidential ones

cdNumbers.description: the list of requested Corporate Discount numbers associated to the group contract. If the group contract is associated to other non-requested Corporate Discount numbers, those are not returned

offerPricing.description: gives the details of a returned offer (rate plan + list of products) over the requested period

productUses.description: list of products (w/o attributes) with associated dates that are part of the offer

totalRate.description: total amount of an offer with extra person

totalBaseOccRate.description: total amount of an offer without extra person

totalExtraOccRate.description: total amount of extra person in an offer

availStatus.description: offer s availability status. In case an requested offer is not available, NotAvailable will be returned. The status OnRequest is only available on the chains/brand supporting the functionality

rateAccessCode.description: requested rate access code attached to the rate plan

freeGuestsDefIds.description: references the free Guests Definition items applied to compute this offer

additionalOfferPricing.description: gives the details of a returned offer(rate plan + list of products) over the requested period

productUses.description: list of products (w/o attributes) with associated dates that are part of the offer

totalRate.description: total amount of an offer with extra person

freeGuestsDefIds.description: references the free Guests Definition items applied to compute this offer

period.description: period where the product is available

productLinesDescs.description: description lines computed by the process based on channel flags and on the short/long descriptions of the room types and the rate plans

isMainProduct.description: indicates if the product rate is the main one. By default, it's false

isOptional.description: indicates if the product rate is not included in the offer. By default, it's false

isConsumedNextDay.description: indicate if the product is consumed next day

numberOfAvailableProducts.description: the number of available products during the stay

pricingFrequency.description: the frequency under which the product is priced. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

pricingMethod.description: the method under which the product is priced. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

bookingPattern.description: the booking pattern defines when and how many times the product is used. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

productRatePricing.description: rate details of the product, optional for isMainProduct=False in case of package, will be displayed for isMainProduct=True and in case of requested optional service

totalRate.description: total amount of an offer with extra person

totalBaseOccRate.description: total amount of an offer without extra person

totalExtraOccRate.description: total amount of extra person in an offer

dailyRates.description: a collection of rate changes by period. It can be a rate change or a tax change

period.description: period where the product is available

isMainProduct.description: indicates if the product rate is the main one. By default, it's false

isConsumedNextDay.description: indicate if the product is consumed next day

pricingFrequency.description: the frequency under which the product is priced. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

pricingMethod.description: the method under which the product is priced. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

bookingPattern.description: the booking pattern defines when and how many times the product is used. Returned only for mandatory products in a predefined package

availablePeriods.description: the list of periods with available products, no period returned when close restriction applies

additionalProductRate.description: rate details of the product, optional for isMainProduct=False in case of package, will be displayed for isMainProduct=True and in case of requested optional service

ratesDef.description: the applicable rate changes of the stay. Amounts can include extra person charges depending on requested number of guests or channel setting

hasRateChange.description: if there are more than one rates in ratesDefinition, this flag will be set to true. It reflects rate change but not tax change

pricingFrequency.description: the frequency under which the product is priced

pricingMethod.description: the method under which the product is priced

bookingPattern.description: the booking pattern defines when and how many times the product is used

isDefaultPricingBased.description: indicates if current product is priced using default rate. By default, it's true

dailyRates.description: a collection of rate changes by period. It can be a rate change or a tax change

availCounters.description: array gathering the availability counters for every day of the given period. Not set in case of unlimited inventory

policiesCommon.description: element containing all the policies regarding guarantee, deposit, cancellation, no-show and early check-out

code.description: code identifying the policy catalog item
code identifying the policy catalog item

feeValue.description: flat amount, flat amount per night, number of nights or percentage fee defined in deposit policy

cancellation.description: the cancellation policy information applicable to the rate plan for the requested period

code.description: code identifying the policy catalog item

feeValue.description: flat amount, flat amount per night, number of nights or percentage fee defined in cancellation policy

isGracePeriod.description: is set to true if policy is not applied. This flag is set to false only if the transaction date in hotel local time requires fees applicable for the cancellation policy or cancellation/No show rule. Otherwise if the transaction date falls outside the cancellation or cancellation/no show rule the flag is set to yes. This flag is returned separately for each rule, one for cancellation and one for cancellation/no show rule if they are present in the response

cancellationNoShow.description: the no-show policy information applicable to the rate plan for the requested period, if present

code.description: code identifying the policy catalog item

feeValue.description: flat amount, flat amount per night, number of nights or percentage fee defined in cancellation no show policy

amt.description: computed amount due for cancellation-noshow policy

refundPercentage.description: the refund percentage corresponds to the percentage out of the penalty that the guest will receive in case of cancellation

isGracePeriod.description: is set to true if policy is not applied

earlyDeparture.description: the early departure policy information applicable to the rate plan for the requested period, if present. Returned only for rate plans having Sleeping room product

feeValue.description: flat amount, flat amount per night, number of nights or percentage fee defined in early departure policy

amt.description: computed amount for early check-out due

isRequired.description: indicates whether the guarantee/deposit is mandatory

policyFeeType.description: the due amount type of the policy

deadlineValue.description: value of the deadline type. Not returned if deadlineType is atBooking

specialEvent.description: if an event or a special requirement occurs during the stay, the GRS applies automatically the restrictions configured for this event and send back the related information

creditCards.description: list of accepted credit cards for guarantees type

taxTypeCode.description: tax code (Refer to [FTT] OTA code list)

chargeUnit.description: unit for which the charge applies. Note that the PerUse charge unit is deprecated

value.description: percentage or flat amount of the tax

endAge.description: end age of the range. If no end age is specified the age range is considered up to infinite

name.description: name (computed short description) of the rate plan

desc.description: short description of the rate plan

longDesc.description: long description of the rate plan

isFreeNight.description: indicates if the rate plan is a free night rate plan

activeDays.description: days on which rate plan is active. If not present, the rate plan is active on all days of the week

checkinDays.description: days on which check-in may be done. If not present, the check-in is possible on all days of the week

stayOverDays.description: the stay must contain at least one of these days. If not present, there is no restriction on the days that must be contained in the stay

minLOS.description: minimum length of stay applied when checking restrictions

maxLOS.description: maximum length of stay applied when checking restrictions

isGroupRatePlan.description: indicates if the rate plan requested is a group rate plan or not

areAmtsConfidential.description: indicates if amounts defined in the rate plan are confidential

isTentativeAllowed.description: indicates if a there is a courtesy hold time before booking of the rate. True if the hotel is courtesy hold enabled and the booking period is entirely in the courtesy hold period

isLoyaltyIdRequired.description: indicates if a loyalty number is required

isPackage.description: indicates if the rate plan is a package

isVoucherRequired.description: indicates if a coupon voucher is required

isRewardEarned.description: indicates if booking this rate gives reward points to the customer

isIdRequired.description: indicates if an ID is required at check-in for this rate

isAwardAccepted.description: indicates if payment for this rate can be done totally or partially using reward points

isPreDefinedPackage.description: indicates if the rate plan is composed of several price plans and products

cdNumbers.description: the list of requested Corporate Discount numbers associated to the negotiated rate plan. If the rate plan is associated to other non-requested CD numbers, those are not returned with the rate plan

isCommissionable.description: indicates if this rate is commissionable or not

rateAccessCodes.description: list of the requested rate access codes attached to the rate plan

ratePlanCodeDenial.description: in case of Rate Plan denials, represents the Rate Plan causing the denial

cdNumber.description: corporate discount Number associated to the rate category

taxInclusionMode.description: indicates the tax inclusion's mode for the product

minDays.description: minimum number of days required for advance booking

maxDays.description: maximum number of days required for advance booking

ratePlanTypes.description: list of rate plan type (OTA codes as per RPT OTA list)

code.description: code of the theme or element

type.description: specifies the type as Theme or Element

name.description: name of the theme or element

policyTypeCode.description: payment policy of the rate plan

isPrimaryRate.description: flag to indicate if the price is coming from the group primary rate plan, only returned if true, default value if not present is false. Applicable only when a Group Code is requested

travelAgency.description: the requested travel agency number giving access to the negotiated rate plan. If the rate plan is associated to other non-requested travel agencies, those are not returned with the rate plan

dailyRateDetailsPricing.description: all details on a given daily rate

subTtlSvcChgExc.description: sub total of all the excluded service charges

subTtlSvcChgInc.description: sub total of all the included service charges

subTtlTxExc.description: sub total of all the excluded taxes

subTtlTxInc.description: sub total of all the included taxes

dailyRateDetailsSingle.description: all details on a given daily rate

rateDefId.description: when Amount is a dailyTotal, id of the reference RatesDefinitions item

taxList.description: the list of applicable taxes for this rate

totalTaxes.description: total of all taxes and fees in a day

totalRateDetails.description: all details on a given total rate

taxGroups.description: the applicable taxes grouped by tax code. If tax code is not present, taxes grouped by OTA FTT code and inclusion in rate

totalTaxes.description: total amount of all applicable taxes

avg.description: average daily rate for the stay per unit for quantity 1

highest.description: highest daily rate for the stay per unit for quantity 1

checkin.description: checkin daily rate for the stay per unit for quantity 1

subTtlSvcChgExc.description: sub total of all the excluded service charges

subTtlSvcChgInc.description: sub total of all the included service charges

subTtlTxExc.description: sub total of all the excluded taxes

subTtlTxInc.description: sub total of all the included taxes

baseAmount.description: amount defined in the CRS which includes included taxes/service charges and excludes excluded taxes/service charges

taxGroups.description: The applicable taxes grouped by tax code. If tax code is not present, taxes grouped by OTA FTT code and inclusion in rate. Returned if requested with option includeTaxAverageDetails.

subTotalServiceChargeExcluded.description: sub total of all the excluded service charges

subTotalTaxExcluded.description: Sub total of all the excluded taxes

payHotelSubTotalServiceChargeExcluded.description: sub total of all the excluded service charges that must be paid at the hotel. Returned only when at least one service charge that must be paid at the hotel is applicable

payableSubTotalServiceChargeExcluded.description: sub total of all the excluded service charges except service charges that must be paid at the hotel. Returned only when at least one service charge that must be paid at the hotel is applicable

payHotelSubTotalTaxExcluded.description: sub total of all the excluded taxes that must be paid at the hotel. Returned only when at least one tax that must be paid at the hotel is applicable

payableSubTotalTaxExcluded.description: sub total of all the excluded taxes except taxes that must be paid at the hotel. Returned only when at least one tax that must be paid at the hotel is applicable

payableAmountAfterTax.description: amount including all taxes/service charges except taxes/service charges that must be paid at the hotel. Returned only when at least one tax or service charge that must be paid at the hotel is applicable

payableTotalTaxes.description: total of all taxes and service charges except taxes and service charges that must be paid at the hotel. Returned only when at least one tax or service charge that must be paid at the hotel is applicable

payHotelTotalTaxes.description: total amount of all applicable taxes and service charges that must be paid at the hotel. Returned only when at least one tax or service charge that must be paid at the hotel is applicable

taxDefinition.description: the applicable rules of taxes over the stay

id.description: a unique ID for this tax definition item. Referenced in rates tax breakdown

taxTypeCode.description: online travel agency (OTA) fee tax type code

name.description: name of the tax of fee

isIncluded.description: indicates if the tax is included or excluded

computationType.description: type of computation, either Flat or Percentage

computationMode.description: which base amount to consider. Possible values are TaxOnTax (tax on another tax), TaxOnNet (tax on amount before taxes) or TaxOnRate(tax on amount including included taxes and excluding excluded taxes)

chargeFrequency.description: how the tax is computed, once or repeated each day

productCodes.description: product Code(s) to which the tax apply

start.description: first date on which the tax definition item applies (for the requested stay)

end.description: last date on which the tax applies (for the requested stay)

dow.description: list of applicable days of weeks. 'MTWTFSS' for all days of weeks. A dash is present for any missing day. For instance, 'MT-----' for Monday and Tuesday only, '-T-T---' for Tuesday and Thursday only

isPaidAtHotel.description: set to true if the tax must be paid at the hotel

guestTypeDefinition.description: the applicable Property Guest Type set-up

otaCodes.title: otaCodes
otaCodes.description: the list of OTA AQC codes associated to the Guest Type. The same OTA AQC code cannot be used in more than one Guest Type

endAge.description: end age of the range. If no end age is specified the age range is considered up to infinite

desc.description: textual description of the Property Guest Type
desc.example: Child guest type, covering age from 0 to 18

amt.description: amount computed for this tax (or group of taxes)

isIncludedInRate.description: indicates if the tax has been included in the rate conveyed in associated "baseAmount". This field takes into account the inclusion set at house and rate plan level

taxDefIds.description: references the tax Definition item applied to compute this tax amount

rateChanges.description: the applicable rate changes of the stay. Gives the definition of rate set in the GRS which can include extra person charges depending on requested number of guests or channel setting

dailyExtraPersonCharge.description: daily amount for 1 extra participant for non-service. Returned depending on channel profile and setting

checkin.description: the checkin rate depending on channel setting, per unit (quantity 1)

highest.description: the highest rate depending on channel setting, per unit (quantity 1)

rateChanges.description: the applicable rate changes of the stay. Gives the definition of rate set in the GRS which can include extra person charges depending on requested number of guests or channel setting

checkin.description: the checkin rate depending on channel setting, per unit (quantity 1)

highest.description: the highest rate depending on channel setting, per unit (quantity 1)

rateChanges.description: the applicable rate changes of the stay. Gives the definition of rate set in the GRS which can include extra person charges depending on requested number of guests or channel setting

start.description: first date on which the rate amount applies (for the requested stay)

end.description: last date on which the rate amount applies (for the requested stay)

amt.description: the daily amount configured in the GRS which can include extra person charges depending on requested number of guests or channel setting. In case of Package, it includes the price of all the products

id.description: a unique ID for this free Guest Definition item

start.description: first date on which the free Guest Definition item applies (for the requested stay)

end.description: last date on which the free Guest Definition item applies (for the requested stay)

dow.description: list of applicable days of weeks. 'MTWTFSS' for all days of weeks. A dash is present for any missing day. For instance, 'MT-----' for Monday and Tuesday only, '-T-T---' for Tuesday and Thursday only

inventoryTypeCodes.description: inventory Type Code(s) to which the free Guest Definition item apply

pricePlanCodes.description: price Plan Code(s) to which the free Guest Definition item apply

maxFreeGuests.description: indicates the overall maximum number of free guests

freeGuestsByType.description: indicates the maximum number of free guests by type

dow.description: list of applicable days of weeks. 'MTWTFSS' for all days of weeks. A dash is present for any missing day. For instance, 'MT-----' for Monday and Tuesday only, '-T-T---' for Tuesday and Thursday only

origin.description: identifies the originator of the error

id.description: id of the warning, used to link the warning to a specific element in the response

identifier.description: unique identifier of the denial returned

date.description: represents the first date that caused the denial. For date-driven denials, it is either a date within the stay, or the check-in date. For non-date-driven denials, it is the transaction date

isHouseLevel.description: set to true if the denial is of House Level type, false otherwise

pricePlanCode.description: in case of Rate/Price Plan denials. Represents the Price Plan causing the denial or the Price Plan linked to the Rate Plan causing the denial

sellStrategyCode.description: represents the code of the Hotel Sell Strategy taken into account in the process

responseError400.description:
bad Request - Client sent a request that is not conforming to API. Client has to modify the request so that it passes

Examples of error codes: 

code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------- 
50028   | Unable to process

responseError401.description: unauthorized - The request requires user authentication

responseError403.description:
forbidden - Server refuses to fulfil request for functional or security reasons. If it is for security reasons, the authentication will not solve the issue

Examples of error codes: 

code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------- 
500xx  | Unable to xx

responseError404.description:
not Found - Client requested resource that does not exist

Examples of error codes: 

code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------- 
50006   | Invalid rate plan 
50002   | Room type doesn't exist
50027   | Invalid system range

responseError500.description:
internal Server Error - Server was unable to process request due to unexpected problem that can't be corrected by client. This error is not used to describe functional problems

Examples of error codes: 

code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------- 
50028   | Timeout reached

responseErrorSingle404.description:
not Found - Client requested resource that does not exist

Examples of error codes: 

code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------- 
50006   | Invalid rate plan 
50002   | Room type doesn't exist
50027   | Invalid system range

responseErrorPricing404.description:
not Found - Client requested resource that does not exist

Examples of error codes: 

code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------- 
50006   | Invalid rate plan 
50002   | Room type doesn't exist
50027   | Invalid system range
